Renal Healthcare

Medical advancement has been one of the biggest blessings of the 21st century. It has allowed many diseases to be cured and has supported many individuals with critical health conditions.

Kidney related disorders have been on the rise in recent times and Renal Healthcare has taken proactive measures to address this issue. By making dialysis treatments and necessary medical equipment available to the people, Renal Healthcare has created a dependable name for itself in the medical domain.

MEDI ASSURE

Manufacturing and providing quality dialysis equipment
Know More

BIOMED ACADEMY LLP

Providing dialysis treatment in a cost-effective manner to the needy
Know More

GERMAN RENAL CARE

A German collaboration of Yashaswi to provide high-end dialysis treatment
Know More

MEDI ASSURE

Manufacturing and providing quality dialysis equipment

ABOUT MEDI ASSURE

Kidney ailments have been on the rise in recent times. Effective kidney treatment seeks high-quality dialysis equipment that treats these ailments and brings relief to the patients.

Medi Assure focuses on manufacturing high-quality dialysis equipment and other medical accessories that are provided to various treatment centres and hospitals.

MEDI ASSURE COLLABORATIONS

The medical equipment manufactured by Medi Assure are in high demand. Medi Assure is associated with many leading names in kidney treatment domain, which use equipment manufactured by Medi Assure.

BIOMED ACADEMY LLP

Providing dialysis treatment in a cost-effective manner to the needy

ABOUT BIOMED ACADEMY

Kidney ailments are commonplace, irrespective of the financial situation. As a result, even the financially underprivileged are in the need for effective and quality dialysis treatment.

Headquartered in Pune, Biomed Academy caters to this rising need of dialysis treatment for the economically underprivileged people, by making the equipment available at cheaper rates, more easily.

ASSOCIATIONS OF BIOMED ACADEMY

Biomed Academy operates at different medical treatment centres, to make available its dialysis treatments, to the people.

GERMAN RENAL CARE

A German collaboration of Yashaswi to provide high-end dialysis treatment

ABOUT GERMAN RENAL CARE

The ones with enough financial support, seek access to better and world-class treatments. The same applies to kidney related ailments also.

Founded in 2015, German Renal Care is committed to providing high-quality, world-class dialysis equipment for patients suffering from kidney ailments, who can afford it.
